definition: festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]
see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]

sentences.english: As far as the plot goes, we know how it's going to end.
sentences.chinese: 我們知道故事情節將怎樣結束。

sentences.english: I don't like too much plot , because I prefer things to be character-driven.
sentences.chinese: 我不喜歡過多的情節，因爲我喜歡由人物推動的故事。

sentences.english: The plots are complicated, and they are flexuous and dramatic.
sentences.chinese: 情節是複雜的，他們是曲折和戲劇。

sentences.english: Remember the terrible accident that opened each episode of the old television show?
sentences.chinese: 想起舊電視節目上展開每段情節的可怕事件了嗎？

sentences.english: Other significant subplots include the adventures of Lydia, the youngest Bennet daughter.
sentences.chinese: 其它重要的次要情節包括班奈特家小女麗迪雅的冒險。

sentences.english: He attempted to add a great amount of imaginary plots to his story.
sentences.chinese: 他試圖以大量虛構的情節爲自己的故事添油加醋。

sentences.english: The new American mood was, if anything, eminently commercial.
sentences.chinese: 新的美國情節意味着，純粹的，異乎常人的商業頭腦。

sentences.english: He pleaded guilty to the lesser charge of unlawful sexual intercourse.
sentences.chinese: 他曾就情節較輕的“非法性行爲”一項指控認罪。

sentences.english: Betrayal does, andit’s a book that has a little more plot than other books of mine.
sentences.chinese: 關於我個人的情節也比先前寫的書多一些。
當然這個是戲劇化的情節。

sentences.english: This applies to the discretion of sentencing judges to avoid arbitrariness in the plot.
sentences.chinese: 這樣可以避免審判人員適用酌定量刑情節隨意性。

sentences.english: And at the discretion of the sentencing of the circumstances in the future development of a number of ideas.
sentences.chinese: 並且對酌定量刑情節未來的發展提出了若干構想。

sentences.english: " Mother" will have you discussing the plot, not entirely to your satisfaction.
sentences.chinese: 《母親》會讓你思考情節，而並非一概滿足你的想象。

sentences.english: She said, however, that because \"a very bad harm was done, \" the courts may grant some latitude.
sentences.chinese: 她說，因爲這個案件情節惡劣，法庭可能會放寬限制。

sentences.english: The plot connects us with nostalgia.
sentences.chinese: 故事情節跟鄉愁聯繫起來。

sentences.english: List all the major and minor plot points and do some writing about them.
sentences.chinese: 然後列出主要和次要的情節，並作做寫作練習。

definition: scene/tableau/picture/image/screen (displayed by a computer)/(motion picture) frame/field of view
script for play, opera, movie etc/screenplay/scenario
to relate (a story or information)/to tell or talk about/to recount/narration/telling/narrative/account
theatrical work (play, opera, TV series etc)/dramatic (change, increase etc)/acute/severe
